mapper.insert: INSERT INTO filenotice (notice_no, file_name, file_rename, file_path, file_date) VALUES (#{notice_no}, #{file_name}, #{file_rename}, #{file_path}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_no, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_category, n.notice_regdate, n.notice_isshow, n.member_id, n.view_cnt FROM notice n WHERE n.notice_no = #{notice_no}

SELECT notice_no, notice_category, notice_title, member_id, notice_regdate, view_cnt, type FROM notice WHERE notice_isshow = 'Y' AND (type = '일반' OR DATEDIFF(NOW(), notice_reservation))
AND notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND notice_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND (notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR notice_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY notice_regdate DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{size};
SELECT * FROM notice WHERE notice_isshow = 'Y' AND (type = 'upView' OR type ='upView,allView') ORDER BY notice_regdate DESC LIMIT 0, 3;

SELECT count(*) as listCnt FROM notice WHERE true
AND notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.update: UPDATE notice set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE notice_no = #{notice_no}
